name: O (DominickTamras)
description:
O is a 3D puzzle game that features a non-euclidean world. Players are sent inside of a blackhole and will explore this black and white world, with your trusty M.B.H (Miniature Black Hole). Being able to send out a blackhole that can be expanded, reversed and grab cubes with it to solve puzzles to reach the end.

A total of 7 levels that with obstacles such as illusionary walls and time reversal to challenge the player and make them think with gravity. 

Dev Note: Currently there is a known bug regarding the time-rewind obstacle, where re-entering the gateway could cause a glitch when the rewind activates, to cause time to speed up outside of the gateway still. To fix this, simply walk back into the gateway to reset it. Currently being looked into for a solution.
